title: Re-run Property Valuation at Renewal
description: As part of a homeowner's policy renewal, the underwriter needs to run an updated replacement cost estimate for the home.

tasks.description: Retrieve the property details from the existing policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter has all the known details about the home (square footage, year built, etc.).

tasks.description: Run a new replacement cost estimate using a third-party valuation tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter gets a new, higher replacement cost due to increased construction costs.

tasks.description: Update the Coverage A (Dwelling) limit on the renewal offer to reflect the new valuation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter increases the coverage on the renewal to ensure the customer is adequately insured.
